Package index

Package Overview

Package documentation and overview

scCulturePredict scCulturePredict-package
scCulturePredict: Single-Cell Culture Media Prediction Package

Main Pipeline Function

Complete analysis pipeline (recommended for most users)

scCulture()
Single-Cell Culture Media Prediction Pipeline
plot_scCulture()
Plot scCulture Results

Data Loading

Functions for loading and preparing single-cell data

load_data()
Load single-cell data
load_packages()
Load required packages for scCulturePredict
load_object()
Load R object from file
save_object()
Save R object to file

Preprocessing

Functions for preprocessing single-cell data

preprocess_data()
Preprocess single-cell data
reduce_dimensions()
Reduce dimensions of single-cell data
perform_dimensionality_reduction()
Perform dimensionality reduction pipeline
perform_pca()
Perform PCA analysis
perform_tsne()
Perform t-SNE dimensionality reduction
run_umap()
Run UMAP dimensionality reduction

Pathway Analysis

Functions for KEGG pathway analysis

parse_kegg_keg()
Parse KEGG pathway file
build_fingerprints()
Build transcriptomic fingerprints
analyze_pathway_activity()
Analyze pathway activity by condition
analyze_pathway_enrichment()
Analyze pathway enrichment
calculate_pathway_activities()
Calculate pathway activities only (for PREDICT mode)

Prediction

Functions for predicting cell culture media

predict_by_similarity()
Predict growth media by similarity
predict_by_svm()
Predict growth media using SVM
predict_cell_types()
Predict cell types using pathway activity
train_cell_type_classifier()
Train cell type classifier
